about_the_game:
THE O-CORP NEEDS YOU

You will take on the vacant role of Agent 13, a Dream Agent who has just started his dream job at the O-CORP, a company that watches over the well-being of the collective subconscious of humanity. In this job, you will be sent on a multitude of missions deep into the human subconscious in order to get rid of possible threats, gather resources, or simply do whatever the corporation asks you to do.

FAST PACED GAMEPLAY

Run, jump, hook, and slide through EVERDREAM's scenarios like a boss. Make your way to the top of the company while upgrading Agent 13 skills with new movement abilities in order to complete your missions harder, better, faster, and stronger.

MULTITUDE OF WEAPONS

Get used to the 13 guns manufactured by and for the O-CORP to complement agents' skills and style. Each gun has unique personality and behaviors that complement other weapons creating powerful synergies. Every weapon has a different quality depending on its destructive power.

DIVE INTO THE HUMAN MIND

Every aspect of our game, from the weapons to the whole scenario, enemies, and characters, is based on the human subconscious.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or later
  • Processor: 2.4GHZ Dual Core Processor Or Higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GT Or Equivalent
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.4GHZ Dual Core Processor Or Higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 460 Or Equivalent

short_description: Fast, surreal, psychedelic, and terribly chaotic, EVERDREAM is the manifestation of a fever dream in the shape of a 3D retro shooter.
